```{r}
library(data.table)
#subsetting
DT = data.table(dfa)


DT[2,]
DT[DT$y == "a"]
DT[c(2,3)] 
#subsets based on rows


```


```{r}
#no need for quotation marks
DT[, list(mean(x), sum(z))]

DT[, table(y)]

#adding a new column:
DT[,w:=z*2]
#multiple step functions:
DT[,m:= {tmp <- (x+z); log2(tmp+5)}]
#plyr like operations
DT[, a:= x > 0]
DT[, b := mean(x+w), by = a]
#counting the amt of times that something appears:
DT[, .N, by = x]
#KEYS:
setkey(DT, x)
DT['a'] #subsets by keys
#facilitate joins:
setkey(DT1, x) ; setkey(DT2, x)
merge(DT1, DT2) #merges by the keys (need the same key for both DTs)
#fast reading:
fread(file)

```
